attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That this Government should mandate David Miliband to make it clear to the Saudi Government the extreme level of concern in the UK over the outrageous treatment of a 19-year-old woman who is a victim of gang rape and has been sentenced to 200 lashes and six months in jail. Furhter severe actionagainst the Saudi government, even if it means the UK losing business, must be taken if this sentence is carried out.

rejection.details: Please change the main sentence to give a clear action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
